snippet: In endorsing same-sex marriage, President Obama has offered voters the sharpest possible contrast with Mitt Romney on a social issue that polls show still evenly divides the country.
abstract: In endorsing same-sex marriage, President Obama has offered voters the sharpest possible contrast with Mitt Romney on a social issue that polls show still evenly divides the country.

headline.main: What Romney Has Said About Same-Sex Marriage
